DialogueText.Text: Were you able to retrieve the a bone from the Dragon of Wisdom's remains?

Oh my! What a marvel! A truly legendary artifact! To think, the Selenic Order has the entire remains of a Dragon beneath their lair... Thank you once again for the help; with this, we have everything needed for the ritual! I'll need some time to finish preparing for the ritual, but I'll notify you once we're ready. I can taste our victory over the Selenic Order just over the horizon.

My comrads and I can bring the Orator's attention elsewhere. If you head to the Selenic Order's lair now, you should be able to enter the lower levels without issue. Then just retrieve a bone from the Dragon of Widsom's remains. You may need to use your weapon to actually get a bone off of it...
The remains were... HUNG ON DISPLAY?! That wretch! How dare he?! After we complete the ritual, I'll be sure the Dragon of Widsom is laid to rest properly!
